name: Character Maker QR
first_mes:
Installation Guide

Required Downloads

Lorebook that is need for it to work [Character Maker Combined NSFW Lorebook](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Lorebooks/Character%20Maker%20Combined%20NSFW.json) (Needed) Lorebook that controls generation for each generation [Character Maker Combined NSFW GenRaw Lorebook](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Lorebooks/Character%20Maker%20Combined%20NSFW%20GenRaw.json) (Needed) Sort it after Name A-Z Lorebook that contains user changeable inputs for generations. [Character Maker Combined NSFW Variables](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Lorebooks/Character%20Maker%20Combined%20NSFW%20Variables.json) (Needed) Sort it after Name A-Z ---

Quick Reply Sets

[Visible QR Buttons](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Quick%20Reply%20Buttons/Character%20Maker.json) The only set you need to add to the Global Quick Reply Sets (Needed) It contains 3 buttons. - New Chat and Set Character Gender and Type (Makes a new chat and lets you select Gender, Type and transformation of the character. **Start with this**) - Character Generator Swipe (Lets you swipe the last message making a new one without loosing the old one) - Generate Character Choice (Lets you select what you want to generate next) [Character Maker Generation](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Quick%20Reply%20Buttons/Character%20Maker%20V4.json) All the logic for the Generate Character Choice button. (Needed) 01. Generate Basic Information (Needs to be first) 02. Generate Appearance information (Can be used multiple times) 03. Generate Personality Traits And Quirks 04. Character's Relation to user 05. Generate Relationship Information (Family, Friends, Enemies and Rivals) 06. Generate Known Kinks 07. Generate Latent Kinks (Will be hidden from the rest of the generation) 08. Generate Outfit and Gear (Can be used multiple times) 09. Generate Background Information 10. Generate Interaction Style 11. Generate Contextual Information (Setting and Daily Routine) 12. Additional Notes (Strengths, Weaknesses, Likes, Dislikes, Sexual Knowledge and Sexual Experience) 13. Spells and Abilities 14. Copy Character Rules (Copies the rules the character will follow to the chat from the Lorebook) 15. Generate Extras (Personality Summary and Speech Examples) 16. Generate Scenario (Makes a scenario that can be used as a first message) (Can make multiple) ---

Required External Downloads

[LALib](https://github.com/LenAnderson/SillyTavern-LALib) required for Character Maker LaLib Chat Quick Reply Sets (Needed) (Update needed for V6.0) ---

Optional Downloads

[TabbyAPI Models](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Lorebooks/TabbyAPI%20Loader%20Setting.json) Models and settings i have tried. [SillyTavern-Variable-Viewer](https://github.com/LenAnderson/SillyTavern-Variable-Viewer) Addon for SillyTavern to see variables that are in use. (Recommended for debugging) To debug empty the Flushvar QR button from the "Character Maker V4" set. This let you see all variables that are used and if something is wrong you can probably find it here. a broken var usually looks likt this '{{something}}'. (This "button" empties all local variables that this cards buttons makes) --- For best result use a Empty Persona named user Start by pressing the QR button "New Chat and Set Character Gender and Type"
creatorcomment:
Can generate - Human Female/Male - Anthropomorphic Animals Female/Male - Beastkin Female/Male - Demi-Human Female/Male - Non-Humanoid Female/Male - Pokémon Female/Male (Almost no testing and will probably need a Pokémon Lorebook or a good model) - Machines (Heavy WIP and almost no testing done) [Installation Guide](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/wiki) Using a empty persona is recommended. If you have any tips on refinements of the Lorebook/QR buttons as well if you want any new fields for the generation make a comment (On [chub.ai](https://chub.ai/characters/Drago87/character-maker-sillytavern-quick-reply-driven-0eb2c2852a4f) or on the [github](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker)) and i will look it over. Especially the `/genraw`

Example characters made with this

[Èmilie](https://chub.ai/characters/Drago87/emilie-63c2aa603413) [ST Chat files](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/tree/main/Chat%20Examples)

________________________________

Last Update

V6.1.4 - Beta Fixed some problems when manually setting names and goal. Added information on the Age for Non-Human characters. Updated output. Update [Character Maker v4](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/blob/main/Quick%20Reply%20Buttons/Character%20Maker%20V4.json)

________________________________

All extra information like age/kinks/fears/species will guide the direction of the character. You can then edit the output to your liking or make it regen all of it. Then using [Intro Writer Chan](https://chub.ai/characters/fbdnchoco/intro-writer-chan-3721039feacc) You can generate a First Message If you can think of something to make it better plz make a comment or make a fork (then a comment with a link to the fork)

________________________________

Known Problems When using 'release' branch the FlushVar button will not work. (This should not have any negative effects.)(Not tested for a while now and the release branch may have been updated) If you want to manually remove the variables you can use [SillyTavern-Variable-Viewer](https://github.com/LenAnderson/SillyTavern-Variable-Viewer) or manually remove them by first using the '/listvar' command to get all variables in use followed by '/flushvar x' where x is the variable name. Some subcategories need refining

Can generate - Human Female/Male - Anthropomorphic Animals Female/Male - Beastkin Female/Male - Demi-Human Female/Male - Non-Humanoid Female/Male - Pokémon Female/Male (Almost no testing and will probably need a Pokémon Lorebook or a good model) - Machines (Heavy WIP and almost no testing done) [Installation Guide](https://github.com/drago87/ST-Character-Maker/wiki) Using a empty persona is recommended. Especially the `/genraw`

Example characters made with this

Then using [Intro Writer Chan](https://chub.ai/characters/fbdnchoco/intro-writer-chan-3721039feacc) You can generate a First Message If you can think of something to make it better plz make a comment or make a fork (then a comment with a link to the fork)
